Name: Raising Venture Capital
Type: Unmatched investor access (9–10/10) with direct pipelines to institutional funds.
Equity Taken: Trade-off: Requires giving up 4–10% equity and committing to program time lock-ins.

Name: Early-Stage & Idea Incubation
Type: Highly founder-friendly, taking minimal to zero equity (0–2%) with strong networking.
Equity Taken: Perk: Access to government-backed programs (like NIDHI PRAYAS) and subsidized fees.

Name: Premium Coworking & Scaling
Type: Offers 100% founder freedom with absolutely zero equity taken and a high brand value (9/10).
Equity Taken: Perk: Highly scalable seating and excellent built-in networking for growing teams.

Name: Bootstrapped Student Founders
Type: Completely free to use (no fees, zero equity) with massive seating capacities (100+).
Equity Taken: Trade-off: Very low direct investor access (3/10).
